extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://doc.hexagongeospatial.com/ERDAS%20IMAGINE/ERDAS_IMAGINE_Help/#ERDASIMAGINEFileFormatConcept.htm, http://web.archive.org/web/20130730133056/http://home.gdal.org/projects/imagine/hfa_index.html</field><field name="filenameExtension">img, ige</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A proprietary, partially documented format for multi-layer geo-referenced raster images developed originally for use with ERDAS IMAGINE software.  A key capability of the format is that it distinguishes betweenthematic and continuous raster layers.
name: ERDAS IMAGINE File Format (IMG)
